metadata.Title: CVE-2017-6298 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in ytnef before 1.9.1. This is related to a patchdescribed as "1 of 9. Null Pointer Deref / calloc return value notchecked."

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-6298` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libytnef0 - 1.5-9ubuntu0.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: libytnef package in esm-apps/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.5-9ubuntu0.1').
